data.name: Trip Planner with Crew AI
data.description: Built a travel planning application leveraging Crew AI's multi-agent framework, where specialized agents (city selector, itinerary designer, local guide) collaborate through orchestrated workflows with internet search and calculation tools to generate personalized itineraries.

data.name: Breast Cancer Insights Dashboard
data.description: Created an AI-powered cancer survival prediction tool integrating histopathological image analysis, designing a custom ResNet with Kaplan-Meier survival curves. Applied EDA on genomic profiling to extract tumor features, improving prediction accuracy by 71.6%. Hosted the interactive app via Streamlit for real-time insights.

data.name: Smart CCTV Surveillance System
data.description: Engineered a Python GUI application called Smart CCTV Surveillance system with advanced features like intrusion detection, motion sensor, etc. Enhanced security and functionality compared to traditional CCTV systems, using a finetuned YOLO-v4, by 63%.

data.name: Traffic Surveillance System
data.description: Built an advanced object detection system using YOLO for traffic monitoring, achieved 93% accuracy in identifying vehicle types.
